oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Freeling IT
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rubino, Francesco
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wsdl
Soap webservice
Text analysis
Sentence splitting
Tokenization
POS tagging
Morphological analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Freeling IT is a web service that performs sentence splitting, tokenization, part-of-speech tagging, morphological analysis and lemmatization on Italian texts only. It was originally deployed within the EU-FP7-STREP PANACEA project (www.panacea-lr.eu) and implements the Freeling 2.1 libraries with no modification of the original code (which is available at http://devel.cpl.upc.edu/freeling/downloads?order=time&desc=1). For a description of the Freeling tool see Lluís Padró and Miquel Collado and Samuel Reese and Marina Lloberes and Irene Castellón. FreeLing 2.1: Five Years of Open-Source Language Processing Tools Proceedings of 7th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference (LREC 2010), ELRA La Valletta, Malta. May, 2010.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Istituto di Linguistica Computazionale “A. Zampolli” - Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (ILC-CNR)
